name: GUTTERJAM 3 - Shape Hero
description:
Playing the game is extremely simple.

  1. Download
  2. Extract
  3. Play!
Instruction

Welcome to Shape Hero for the GutterJam 3. You will need to use your reflexes to match the shapes as quick as possible. You can either click on one of the two buttons to change their shapes, or press either the "A" or "D" keys on the keyboard.

Other Items

Sorry, I didn't have a lot of time to put into the game. Having a family with 4 kids really kills productivity. I have included the source code which was all created in GameMaker Studio 2.

Tools Used
  • GameMaker Studio 2 - Programming / Art
  • Audacity - Sound Effect
  • Aseprite - Icon
  • Beepbox - Music
